title: Statistical Theory
description: An introduction to theoretical statistics for students with a background in probability. A mathematical formalism for inference on experimental data will be developed. Credit not awared for both MATH 3236 and MATH 3215 or 3225 or 3670.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 3235 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D
